manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KUNMI Women's Ripped Skinny Jeans Distressed Stretchy Denim Pants, Stretch Jeans for Women Tummy Control Ripped Jeans for Women at KUNMI Here at KUNMI, we can't get enough of denim. That's why we've created an entire collection dedicated to ripped jeans for every occasion. Whether you're looking for something dressy for a party or you need a casual pair to wear on off-duty days, you'll find plenty of fashion-forward styles in our round-up. Discover slimming designs from the KUNMI. We've even got options from denim experts KUNMI.

Finding the Perfect Fit Ripped Jeans Our ripped jeans for women come in all kinds of sizes, so everyone can give this trend a go. There are options to suit every body type - whether you're tall, petite or plus size. Next, consider which rise you prefer: mid-rise jeans sit just above the hips, while high-rise designs come up to your belly button. Try skinny-fit styles if you prefer a streamlined look, or go for a looser pair if comfort is at the top of your priorities list. Mom jeans are ideal for creating a vintage vibe, while flares can help to balance proportions.

Women's Ripped Jeans in Light and Dark Washes The wash you choose can completely change up the feel of your outfit. Women's ripped jeans in a lighter wash create a more informal feel that's perfect for browsing the shops on the weekend or going for walks in the park. If it's a smarter and dressier finish you're after, selecting a darker wash with minimal fading will feel a touch more sophisticated. Style them with blazers and strappy heels for date night or floral blouses and boots for trips to the cinema.

WHAT IS THE BEST TYPE OF JEANS FOR ME? The best type of jeans for you depends on your body type and the occasion. If you have a slim or skinny body type, ripped jeans would be a great choice. For a casual event like a barbecue or party, ripped jeans would also be a good choice. If you have a curvy body type, distressed jeans might be a better option because they can make you look wider than you are. Distressed jeans are also more suitable for dressier occasions than ripped jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit is great
reviews.reviewText: These fit true to size. They have an adequate amount of stretch, but don’t over stretch out through out the day. The distressed detailing is tasteful and well crafted. They have washed well. Overall great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit- hugs all the right places
reviews.reviewText: I am always hesitant to purchase pants or jeans online, but I took a chance because these jeans looked so cute! I sized down because they have a bit of stretch. As soon as I received them I tried them on and they were perfect! They hugged in all the right spots, so much better than most jeans I have tried on in stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very long inseam
reviews.reviewText: Nice color, stretch and comfortable but has very deep pockets and is not a mid rise. I ordered regular length and the inseam was 31” a bit long for me. Also should have ordered one size down but the waist is smaller so will see how they are over time. Ordered normal size 12 and the legs are a bit baggy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For all of us women that are 40, and over/or have had children these are your pants. They are high waisted, and all buttons, stretchy, and they are flattering around our hips in our thighs. I am 55, so there are a tiny bit long for me, but they look great with a pair of vans, or a pair of high heels either way, I will absolutely buy these again. True to size, color all of it, and for a very reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really deep pockets
reviews.reviewText: I hate to complain about my pants having pockets too big. I mean, we have fought fashion for usable pockets for decades, right? But the pockets on these require a certain amount of care when you’re putting the jeans on to get them laying right and they are almost too deep.Other than that, these are your typical cheap blue jeans. The zipper is super cheap. The fabric isn’t thick enough to be helpful at shaping. Like literally no butt lift at all and they give visible panty line. They fit as expected and look fine on. I have thick ankles and some skinny jeans cut off my circulation, but these are comfortable. I am 5’5” 160lbs and ordered a size 12. They fit as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent fit and materials are low quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought 4 pair of these jeans in different washes, but all in the same size. The first pair that arrived fit great at first try on and I liked the stretch. I noticed that the zipper was of cheap quality and kind of catches on itself, but I was willing to overlook that because I thought the fit was good. For the low price and decent fit, I ordered a few more colors in that same size. The next 3 pair that arrived did not fit right at all. Despite being the same size the other pairs ran small. On one pair, the fabric that is supposed to cover the zipper was sewn off a bit so the zipper would always be exposed. I returned other three pair immediately after trying them on and only kept the one. The stitching in the inside of the waist is hard and rubs uncomfortably, especially after a few washes. The pair that I kept that did fit well at first shrank quite a bit after a few washes and they don’t fit well anymore. Would not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice length for a tall girl!
reviews.reviewText: I am taller than average and need the longer inseam. These went right down to my ankle bone. That’s a great surprise! I’ve lost weight recently, so I’m still exploring my size. These have amazing stretch, and are a little bigger than I expected- but again, I’m not sure what size I truly am. Stay true to size just in case! Buying a few more in a smaller size. These will definitely go on the turkey/pms/travel day/comfy pile to be worn again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fit. I’m 5’2” and the length is just right. Excellent quality. Super comfy. Color is perfect. But, the zipper stuck immediately! It’s not a cheapy zipper. It’s not stitched improperly. It’s just one of those sharp, metal zippers (if that makes sense) that’s prone to stick. They elasticity is so good, I can leave them zipped and still get get them on and off. But, I’m sure I’ll forget and unzip them and it’ll stick again. I would have given 5 stars if not for that one thing.
